name: Ingleside Community Center
description: The Ingleside Community Center's mission is to serve the families of the Oceanview, Merced Heights and Ingleside District, along with other surrounding communities, by providing a safe, rigorous and welcoming learning environment through credentialed educational learning, social development, sports activities and (S.T.E.A.M) academic training. fullDescription: The Ingleside Community Center's mission is to serve the families of the Oceanview, Merced Heights and Ingleside District, along with other surrounding communities, by providing a safe, rigorous and welcoming learning environment through credentialed educational learning, social development, sports activities and (S.T.E.A.M) academic training. Our goal is to continue contributing towards a positive and productive society, while strengthening our students with the very best personal development h
whatTheyOffer: Ingleside Community Center is able and willing to provide services to youth and families in District 7. the Ingleside Community Center building is an official landmark of the city. The Ingleside Community Center would like to build on their established mark within the community as a service provider assisting low-income families.
